body.name: SIMARTH King Mattress, 12 Inch Hybrid King Size Mattresses in a Box, Memory Foam King Mattress Made of Individually Pocketed Springs for Support and Pressure Relief, Medium Firm
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 17 hrs 38 mins
features: PRESSURE RELIEF: This medium firmness mattress features multiple support layers that allow the mattress to precisely fit every inch of the body, spreading pressure evenly to all parts of the body, relieving pressure points and eliminating body fatigue and pain.

POWERFUL EDGE SUPPORT: The King size mattress is upgraded with reinforced individual pocketed springs that provide strong edge support to prevent sagging. Provides enough support for the correct alignment of your spine, absorbs motion interference between partners and gives you a complete night's sleep.

STAY FRESH AND COMFORTABLE: This is a high density foam mattress designed for all types of sleepers. Designed with soft and breathable knit fabric and multiple memory foam layers, it keeps you from feeling overheated during the night, suitable for all sleeping positions and waking up feeling refreshed.

KIING SIZE MATTRESS IN A BOX: The Hybrid King Size Mattress measures 76 "W x 80 "D x 12 "H and has a maximum weight capacity of 1100 lbs and fits most full size beds. The mattress comes in a boxed compression package and can be installed by yourself, simply place it on the desired bed and unpack it.

QUALITY ASSURANCE: This Queen size mattress comes with a 100 night trial and 10 year support and has been pressure tested 100,000 times for quality. For a perfect sleeping experience, it is recommended that you return the mattress to its optimal condition within 24 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Hybrid Mattress Features: A.Super Stretch Fabric: A natural and breathable fabric that enhances comfort and airflow, providing a lift sensation and reducing motion transfer for a peaceful sleep. B.Pressure Relief Memory Foam: Temperature-sensitive memory foam that conforms to your body's curves, relieving pressure points and ensuring an optimal sleeping surface for a restful night. C.High Density Support Foam: An additional layer of firm high density foam that offers enhanced support from head to toe for better spinal alignment. D.Fire-Resistant Foam: Treated with special fireproof substances to create a safe sleeping environment. E.Individually Wrapped Coil System: Innovative high-tech coils individually encased to reduce motion disturbance and alleviate body pressure points, delivering the ultimate comfort and support. F.High Density Base Foam: An extra layer of high density foam providing added support for the innerspring system, contributing to the mattress's overall durability. Product Details: Comfort Level: Medium Firm Mattress Type: Innerspring Product Highlights: Breathable, Edge Support, Pressure Relief, Low Motion Transfer

Mattress Dimensions: Full: 54*75*12 Inch; Approx. 66 lbs; Box Size: 57*11*11 Inch Queen: 60*80*12 Inch; Approx. 77 lbs; Box Size: 63*11*11 Inch King: 76*80*12 Inch; Approx. 96 lbs; Box Size: 79*11*11 Inch

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleeping Better Than Ever!
reviews.reviewText: Ever since I started sleeping on this 12-inch queen hybrid mattress, my nights have transformed into a soothing retreat. The mattress perfectly balances support with the individually pocketed springs and the plush comfort of memory foam. It cradles my body just right, alleviating any discomfort and allowing me to wake up rejuvenated. The medium firmness is a great fit for both me and my partner, satisfying our different sleeping preferences. The mattress expanded quickly after unboxing, which was surprisingly easy to handle. The double-layer raw cotton fabric cover feels luxurious and adds to the overall comfort. This mattress is not just a sleeping surface; it’s a significant upgrade to my overall well-being. The price point is fantastic for the quality and comfort it offers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality Sleep Without Breaking the Bank
reviews.reviewText: After much research, I decided to take a chance on this queen-sized hybrid mattress, and it's one of the best decisions I've made for my sleep health. The mattress is wonderfully comfortable, offering a great combination of support from the springs and softness from the memory foam. It conforms to my body, providing relief and comfort throughout the night.The medium firmness is perfect for me. It's not too hard nor too soft, just the right level of firmness to support my body without feeling like I'm sleeping on a rock. The raw cotton fabric cover is a nice touch, it feels soft and adds to the overall comfort.I was a bit skeptical about buying a mattress online, but the value for money with this one is incredible. It’s given me quality sleep at a fraction of the cost of high-end mattresses. Setting it up was simple, and watching it expand after unboxing was quite fun. For anyone on a budget looking for a quality mattress, I highly recommend this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Transformed My Nights into Restful Sleep
reviews.reviewText: I've had this 12-inch hybrid mattress for a few weeks now, and it's transformed my nights. The individually pocketed springs and memory foam create a perfect sleeping surface that cradles my body while still providing ample support. It's a noticeable upgrade from my previous mattress.One of the best features is how well it isolates movement. My partner tosses and turns a lot, but with this mattress, I hardly feel it, which means better sleep for both of us. The medium firmness hits the sweet spot for our comfort preferences.I also appreciate the convenience of having it delivered in a box. Unpacking and setting it up was surprisingly easy. For its price, this mattress is a fantastic value. It's improved my sleep quality drastically, making it a purchase I'm extremely happy with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and comfortable mattress
reviews.reviewText: A soft and comfortable mattress can provide a high-quality sleep experience, and fortunately, I have found such a mattress. It is a hybrid mattress, consisting of multiple supportive layers. The super-elastic fabric is very breathable, enhancing comfort and airflow. Previously, I would feel hot at night, but since using this mattress, I wake up feeling refreshed. The pressure-relieving memory foam is temperature-sensitive and perfectly conforms to my body's curves to alleviate pressure. High-density support foam provides good support for the whole body, preventing sagging when lying on the bed. Additionally, it includes fire-retardant foam, high-density base foam, and an individually wrapped coil system. Surprisingly, the mattress also has an inner spring system. Such a high-quality mattress makes me never want to leave the bed; it's just too soft and comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Restful Nights, Supportive Mornings
reviews.reviewText: The SIMARTH Full Mattress has been a revelation for my sleep routine. The hybrid design, marrying memory foam with individually pocketed springs, provides a balance of comfort and support that has noticeably improved my sleep quality. No more waking up with aches – the medium firmness is just right, cradling the contours of my body while keeping my spine aligned. Plus, the cooling technology in the foam layers means I stay comfortable all night, a game-changer for someone who tends to overheat. It's a compact sleeping solution that didn't require a moving crew to set up, making it a practical choice for hassle-free rest.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfort in a Box
reviews.reviewText: Unboxing the SIMARTH Full Mattress was an experience in itself – compactly packaged yet expansive in comfort once laid out. I was skeptical about a mattress that comes rolled up could provide such firm support, but I was pleasantly surprised. The individually pocketed springs adapt to movement with ease, ensuring that my partner's nighttime shuffles don't become my disturbance. The foam layer on top is like the icing on a very comfortable cake, adding that plush feel without the sinking sensation. It's been a valuable addition to my home, delivering restful nights from day one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Item description has changed
reviews.reviewText: When I ordered this item in December, it was for a queen sized mattress COVER, not a queen mattress.The five star rating is for the mattress cover.It fits very well on my queen bed and is very soft, with deep corner pockets. It washes up really well, staying very smooth to the touch.
